message: The Hidalgo County District Attorney’s Office will soon become the first in the nation with a human trafficking unit dedicated to prosecuting cases of forced labor in the agricultural sector.

data.description: EDINBURG — The Hidalgo County District Attorney’s Office will soon become the first in the nation with a human trafficking unit dedicated to prosecuting cases of forced labor in the agricultural sector. The new unit is set to begin operation early this year and is the result of a grant from the ...
data.title: Hidalgo County DA first in nation to focus unit on human trafficking - The Monitor
